subtitle: Kuganira na mama wawe bizagufasha kumenya impinduka zizakubaho nugera mu bwangavu
description: Kuganira na mama wawe bizagufasha kumenya impinduka zizakubaho nugera mu bwangavu
title: Nganirizwa na Mama
content:
Ubusanzwe ababyeyi ntibakunda kuganiriza abana babo ku mpinduka ziba zizababaho mu bwangavu. Abakobwa bake ni bo bagira amahirwe yo kubona ibisobanuro nyakuri mbere y’uko za mpinduka zitangira kubabaho. Kelia na Nicole, bo bagize ayo mahirwe. “Ni Nyampinga” twarabaganirije, ngo batubwire inyungu zo kuganirizwa hakiri kare.

Kelia afite imyaka 11. Atuye mu Karere ka Bugesera. Kelia yagize amahirwe yo kuganirizwa na mama we ku kuntu umubiri we uzahinduka nagera mu bwangavu. Byongeye kandi, yagize amahirwe yo kwitabira gahunda y’abana b’abakobwa bafite hagati y’imyaka I0 na 12 yitwa “12+”. Iyi ni gahunda bashyiriweho, kugira ngo ibahe ubumenyi butandukanye buzabagirira akamaro mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi, harimo n’ubuzima bw’imyororokere.

Kelia asobanura ubwangavu atya: “Iki ni igihe umwana w’umukobwa aba atangiye kugira impinduka zitandukanye ku mubiri we. Muri zo harimo kumera amabere, kujya mu mihango, kumera insya n’izindi.” 

Kelia avuga ko nta bwoba bimuteye kuba yitegura kwinjira mu bwangavu. Ati “Ubwangavu nabuganirijweho na mama, ndetse mbusobanurirwa n’abafashamyumvire bo muri gahunda ya 12+”. Kelia, ngo ibi byatumye amenya uko azitwara nagera mu bwangavu. 

Nicole we, ni umukobwa w’imyaka 20 y’amavuko. Atuye mu Karere ka Gicumbi. Nicole yatubwiye ko ngo yinjira mu bwangavu bitamugoye, kuko ngo iwabo bari barabimuganirijeho. Ikindi kandi ngo yari yarabibwiwe mu mahugurwa yahawe n’abagide.
Aganira na “Ni Nyampinga” yaratubwiye, ati “ngeze mu bwangavu, ikintu cyanshimishije cyane kurusha ibindi ni ukumera amabere, kuko nabonaga abandi bayafite nkumva nanjye ndayashaka”.  

Kuba Nicole yaragize ubumenyi hakiri kare, ngo byamufashije guca mu gihe cy’ubwangavu yishimiye impinduka ziri kumubaho, kuko yari abizi neza ko atangiye kuva mu bwana yerekeza ku kuba mukuru. 

Nicole yasoje agira ati “ntibyari bikwiriye ko ababyeyi bataganiriza abana babo. Ni iby’ingenzi cyane guha ubumenyi umwana ku bwangavu mbere yo kubwinjiramo, bituma umwana abugeramo nta kimutunguye”.
